description.narrative: Reintegration into the Afghan society, for Persons with Specific Needs (PSN)

title.narrative: Capacity Building Program for Reintegration and Social Protection

description.narrative: The pilot model program at Kabul Marastoon will be fully functional with documented 100% successful outcomes for returnees enrolled in the program. The training institute will complete a training program for ARCS Marastoon staff and replication of the model program components supported by financial awards from this project will be satisfactorily implemented in the regional Marastoons.
